quests.Name: The Colosseum's Call
quests.Description: Marcus seeks refuge in the gladiatorial arena, where his combat prowess catches the attention of a skilled metalsmith.

quests.Name: The Metalsmith's Request
quests.Description: Marcus aids the metalsmith in a perilous mission, forging an alliance and uncovering clues about his family's fate.

quests.Name: The Ruins of Argenstone
quests.Description: Joined by scholar Sophia, Marcus explores ancient ruins, uncovering secrets amidst treacherous traps and puzzles.

quests.Name: The Alchemist's Secret
quests.Description: Marcus delves into the world of alchemy, embarking on a risky theft to uncover hidden truths about his family's murder.

quests.Name: The Herbalist's Bounty
quests.Description: Marcus gathers herbs for Flora, encountering memory challenges amidst wilderness dangers while forging a bond with Sophia.

quests.Name: The Rebel's Cry
quests.Description: Marcus aids rebels with a Snake-like challenge, navigating perilous paths in support of their cause.

quests.Name: The Noble's Game
quests.Description: Marcus eavesdrops on nobles, unraveling intrigue while avoiding detection in high society.

quests.Name: The Shadow Broker's Alliance
quests.Description: Marcus enters the underworld, engaging in burglary and combat to gain the Shadow Broker's favor.

quests.Name: The Oracle's Warning
quests.Description: Marcus seeks guidance from the Oracle, facing mystic visions and ancient prophecies.

quests.Name: The Sea's Secret
quests.Description: Marcus embarks on a seadiving treasure hunt, braving underwater perils in search of riches.

quests.Name: The Heist
quests.Description: Marcus plans a daring theft, combining strategy and Minesweeper skills to execute the perfect heist.

quests.Name: The Shadow Broker's Vaults
quests.Description: Marcus navigates locks and security measures, uncovering secrets in the Shadow Broker's lair.

quests.Name: The Final Confrontation
quests.Description: Marcus faces the main antagonist in a climactic showdown, overcoming various challenges in the ultimate battle.
